40971706.review:
画质特别好，种地种到停不下来， 背景音乐特别好评。
整个游戏的大环境个人真的是非常的喜欢，制作组每周一更新也是很可以了，但是在细节和操作上还是有很多反人类的设定和不完善。
1.农场地皮是特别大，我现在才开了四块地，跑一圈真的挺累的，去别人的家，大一点的农场，完全是迷路的状态，我是谁，我在哪。希望能有加入地图或者导航和传送功能。然后就是能有按键自动走路，加速之类的技能，一直按着W走路，真的挺累的，不然我真的不敢再扩地了。
2.希望任务系统能更加完善一点，现在也就是为了徽章才做任务，换完加油站之后，做任务的动力都没了。或者增加任务奖励的道具，可以去换建筑，人物和拖拉机的装扮之类的，增加趣味和收集性。
3.希望能出玩家间能互相交互的订单系统，自己种的东西能放在集市一样的地方出售给需要的人，如果不能做成交易方式，也可以做成可以增加声望，成就，换限定的道具，建筑，装扮之类的，这样种起东西来也会有动力。

40971387.review:
从购买到现在，完了不下80多个小时，更新也经历了3次。然而一次比一次失望，这次的更新更是失望至极。
1.增加了升级经验。这个增加可不想之前的降低部分产品的收益，是大幅度增加（至少高等级是这样），一个标着休闲的游戏，到现在只能靠拖慢升级进度来延长生命周期，真的可悲。也许是官方看到很多大佬都已经人物100，农场100（笑）才做出的决定吧。
2.任务数量又1变3，每24小时能刷新一个。这个改动看起来不错，但是任务的奖励依旧惨不忍睹。以本人为例2440只新出的2小时一收获的羊驼，给3个牌子和不到2W的经验，说实话真的没什么吸引力。
3.喂养动物由10上升到12，收获鱼由10上升到15，而且操作由单点优化成按住，这些改动能看出策划组确实让操作更加人性化了，但后果是什么？后果就是收益又降低了！上次更新明确说明了收益降低，果树的貌似是升一级的收益砍掉一半（李子树由10变5），牲畜的没太注意不过确实有下降。这次更新上没说，单收益确实下降了。（高级奶牛升级收益由20下降到17，荔枝树由10下降到8）。策划组估计是严格按照多劳多得，少劳少得，不劳不得来设计游戏的吧。照这样看，自动化农场已经离我们远去了。
4.这3次更新，功能型建筑就一个加油站，大部分都是作物、牲畜、果树、和鱼。功能型建筑可能涉及的整个游戏的走向，不好短时间内拿出来，但你连装饰性建筑都不肯增加，这是几个意思？（增加了几面国旗）
5.联机问题一直没有消息，之前有小伙伴互相进不去的，这次更新我进了几个，还没发现进不去，不知是修复了还是我运气好。不过去小伙伴帮忙出了人物经验没有任何奖励，这严重影响了联机的体验，不知是策划组已经放弃了，准备做个单机，还是有大动作？
综上所述，肯定的是策划组的尽心尽力，毕竟一个小众游戏保持每周一更的速度已经很不错了，不过这3次更新的内容真的让我看不到这个游戏未来的游戏点在哪里，希望下次更新能给小伙伴们眼前一亮吧，要不真要送一首凉凉了。

40938537.review:
樱桃树下等待着那个她的痴痴少年，等待着，少女遵守承诺的那一天到来。

“要等我啊。”

少女离去的场景历历在目，少年痴痴地相信着，等待着。

不知渡过了多少个春夏秋冬，少年看遍了这片田地上的形形色色。

当他收获了一地又一地的南瓜，从水井里捞出了一堆又一堆的金币。

少女仍旧没有回来。

“不会种田的家伙，很逊吧。”

少女曾经这么说过，少年回忆起来。

他们曾一同坐在田地里播种，在池塘中戏水，在树荫下乘凉。
多么美好的回忆呀。
“如果还能像以前那样快乐就好了。”少年有些垂头丧气，看着水中的倒影，他强颜欢笑，想让少女一回来就看到完美的笑容。

又是多少个春夏秋冬呢？

山丘上的樱桃树结下了一筐又一筐的果实，少年送走了一批又一批的货物。

可是少女，依然没有回来。

太阳西下，残阳如血。

少年又回到了那棵，他和少女一同种下的，樱桃树下。

他似乎是明白了，那份美好可能永远都不会再回来了。

于是樱桃树下的少年抱起了吉他，演奏出往日的美好。

或许。

他需要的。

只是那一份美好的记忆。

“有时候快乐不是件很简单的事情吗？”

他露出了自己的笑容。

水中的倒影，不仅只有自己。

还有那个，一直陪伴在他身旁，形影不离的少女。

伴随着悠扬的琴声，少年又想起了他最初和少女见面的场景。

“你好呀~”少女曾说。

“不玩Farm together的人，很逊吧~”少女笑道。

少年傻傻地摇摇头，闭上了眼睛。

“嗯。不玩Farm together的人，确实很逊。”

40934165.review:
There isn't much game to the game.

Right off the bat I will say this game has a great look to it, the art style is perfect for the genre, the characters are gorgeous, even the tractor can be customised, the gameplay is smooth and lag free, the mechanics work fantastic and its obvious the title has developers who care, the only problem is progression the game provides no real risk/reward factor, you grow crops, to grow crops, to grow crops, to get land, to grow crops to grow crops, to get more land to grow more crops, can you see where this is going?

Quests seem to be a lettuce obsessed system I have never grown so much lettuce in any game, as quest after quest called for increasing amounts of lettuce to unlock next tier of quest which was.. yep growing lettuce related.

Crops don't even require you to water them often, they will grow without it, albeit much more slowly, for an AFK gamer this means you can log in, plant and log out.

But that doesn't matter.

The best point of the game is being able to visit other player farms and have players visit your farm, the system allows you to work towards leveling your character and each other's farms with friends or total strangers, I've played hundreds of games and to me this has been my ultimate social experience on steam, within minutes of logging I had found a famr to help on, struck up a convo with the owner and we talked about everything from Walking Dead to Rainbow siege as we farmed lettuce.. so much lettuce.

We ended up becoming steam friends and already planning our next game adventures be they lettuce related or not.

For those wanting a social title Farm Together cannot be beaten on quality or value.

Value for money.

For a game, probably no, but for a gorgeous interactive social experience coupled with a fun& basic game 100% yes, I would gladly pay double for this title.

https://bluntlyhonest.review/2018/03/20/farm-together-a-poor-game-but-a-great-social-experience/

40922780.review:
Vou começar com considerações que trazem os pontos positivos do jogo. Então, Farm Together é um jogo divertido, ainda mais pela possibilidade de jogar com amigos. Quem está acostumado com o clássico Harvest Moon, ou até o mais moderno Stardew Valley, pode vir a se interessar mais ainda pelo jogo. Apesar de não haver uma história por traz, as mecânicas, o design ‘’cartunesco’’, a temática e o modo online, fazem os R$ 28,99 ''valerem a pena''. 

Mas, preciso fazer minhas considerações negativas que, com o passar do tempo, acredito que se tornarão ainda mais negativas. Bom, o jogo é facilmente alterável, no sentido de já existirem diversas ferramentas (cheats/bots) que atropelam todos os objetivos estabelecidos pelo game (mesmo que poucos, ainda). Como o jogo é online, pessoas podem visitar a sua fazenda, acessar as informações dela, como: Level da Fazenda, Level do Personagem, Level dos Itens, Dinheiro, Diamante, Medalhas, andamento dos objetivos (Quest), fora todo o conteúdo da fazenda. Por mais que seja um jogo mais ''tranquilo'', pelo fato de ser online, existe uma certa competitividade ''intrínseca''. Ao meu ver, a criatividade de cada pessoa ao desenvolver uma fazenda mais bem apresentável e organizada, é o que gera essa ''leve competitividade''. Mas, para conseguir chegar neste patamar (de forma justa / sem uso de cheat), isso exige tempo, paciência e dedicação para conseguir o dinheiro. 

Entrei em contato com um dos desenvolvedores da MilkStone, o mesmo informou que não há interesse da empresa em tomar alguma ação contra pessoas que usam softwares para modificação do game.

Então, minha conclusão é que, poderia ser um jogo muito mais interessante se não houvessem formas de burlar as metas propostas pelo game. Até porque não faz sentido ter uma empresa de jogos, pagar funcionários, programadores, game designers para desenvolver objetivos / desafios que serão facilmente alcançados. Considero um péssimo negócio e perda de tempo.

 Mas se você é uma pessoa que não se importa com cheaters, com o desinteresse da empresa em melhorar isso, não costuma jogar com sentimento de competitividade, este será um joguinho bacana.

40919006.review:
的确是3D开心农场，没有剧情，没有村民，玩家孤身一个老农民。
农场时间是实时的，玩家下线作物、果树、动物等生长时间继续，农场每17分钟更换季节，不同季节可种不同作物，果树在相应季节成熟并可收获果实。
农田只有耕作、种植、浇水和收获。养殖鸡牛鱼是放置型的，只有喂养和收获（鱼不用喂）。
所有物品种植或放置直接扣金钱，收获直接加金钱，没有市场。
另外有水井和蜂巢这种设施，定时可以收获获得金钱或钻石；水果摊、蔬菜摊等设施用于定时定量可以出货换取钻石，获得经验较多。
农田、养殖、设施等收获或出货均可获得经验，经验值增加个人和农场等级，应该是农场等级决定可种植或养殖的物品，个人等级决定可开垦的地区（方向不限）。
恩，适合养老。游戏内容就那么点，不卡不卡不卡。

40901158.review:
Uma review bem simples pra mostrar alguns pontos desse jogo.
O jogo em si é relativamente bonito e até que está otimizado, mas tem alguns pontos que me incomodam e que me fizeram reconsiderar a compra desse produto, você começa com uma grande quantia de dinheiro, com isso você compra sementes que já dão um lucro considerável logo no começo do jogo (alface você compra por 15 e vende por 30 e é literalmente a primeira semente liberada) e não tem de coletar recursos, não tem crafting, não tem nenhuma forma de ganhar dinheiro sem ser comprando as seeds. O esquema de estações é relativamente estranho, não tem nenhum influência na velocidade de crescimento das plantas e nem o tempo em que é preciso molhá-las. As construções são meramente decorativas e não acrescentam nada ao gameplay (pelo menos até o ponto que eu liberei).
Tirando isso, é um jogo interessante, bom para jogar com os amigos e até mesmo com estranhos (nos primeiros 5 minutos de jogo uma garota entrou no meu mundo e começou a me dar várias dicas interessantes) o que até equilibra as coisas, mas como o jogo é early access ainda tem mto potencial para expandir e adicionar novas mecânicas que podem me fazer comprar ele novamente.

40889826.review: I enjoy how the crops continue to grow outside of playing the game. Similar to animal crossing in that respect. My pal and I love planting and tending to the 2 day crops before calling it a night. Just to come back the next time we can hang to a bountiful harvest. The simplicity of it all can be a little off putting. You don’t deal with individual types of veggies, fruits, and etc. They all lump into one unit of said category. So picking apples, bananas, and melons, all add a unit of fruit to your inventory. You use those units to obtain a different form of currency I call gems or diamonds. Then you use that currency to build more of the building-esk structures like silos, barns, roads, and most storage. So basically money builds crops, diamonds build props. The one exception is badges/ribbons you get for completing generic quests. So far in my playtime i’ve only seen them used to build gas stations. Which are a must to power your tractor. The only thing this game feels like it’s missing is a little more “life”. While it has crazy depth with the kinds of crops you can plant, how massive the farm can grow, and the variety of things you can invest in (such as livestock, fish, and Trees). I find the game to be, even with a friend, lacking some kinda immersion/life. Don’t get me wrong, my pal and I have a farmers market set up with lamps and stalls, a section with barns and hay littering the area with chickens. A pond with several kinds of ducks. Visually i feel accomplished. I just, in my personal opinion, wish it all had some purpose that i can’t seem to create for myself, other than to enjoy the next tier of content and get rich. Which it isn’t a problem honestly as this game has met its goal of “Farming together”. I’ll admit my yearn stems from other farming games like stardew valley, rune factory, and (while not strictly a farming game) Animal crossing but this game never said it was going to be like those so I’ll enjoy it for what it is as long as i can :D!

40886140.review:
Purchased the game on the 17th and have played 6 hours straight, the game is very addicting ( for me at least ) 
Having to manage your own farm,plant veg, plants, fruit etc, livestock and fish, is just great fun.
Just a quick word of warning, if you have livestock dont spend all your money on crops that will take a few days until you can harvest them, because then you wont be able to feed your livestock.
The items you can place down are very well designed, and need diamonds to purchase along with a farm lvl. 
Quickest way I have found to farm diamonds is make a harvest area and just plant Lettuce then make a veg stand to sell that on, you get 5 diamonds a min if you have a lot of veg to sell on there, so make a big harvest area.  Lettuce takes 10 mins to harvest, less if you keep up with the watering.  Same goes with a fruit stand, I use the raised section in my farm and planted / moved all the apple trees there, then sell your apples on the stand.
Overall I would highly recommend this game if you love farming and just having fun. 10/10.

40885136.review:
Ich habe Farm Together jetzt knappe 40 Stunden gespielt.
Vorweg gesagt: Ich würde das Spiel auf jeden Fall empfehlen!

Fangen wir von Anfang an an: Zuerst bekommen wir die Grundlagen des Spieles erklärt. Indem wir den Anweisungen folgen, schreiten wir im Tutorial voran. Das ganze Spiel ist sehr simpel aufgebaut. Die gesamte Spielewelt ist durch Quadrate eingeteilt. Auf jedem dieser Quadrate können wir etwas anpflanzen, oder ein Gebäude, Verschönerung etc. positionieren. 
Jede Pflanze kann bis Level 100 gelevelt werden! Es gibt eine relativ große Auswahl an Items. Dadurch, dass das Spiel noch in der Early-Access-Phase ist, kommen durch regelmäßige Updates neue Items hinzu. 

Bis zu 16 Spieler_innen können gleichzeitig auf einer Farm zusammen spielen. Je nach Einstellungen, kann jeder auf unsere Farm spawnen und mithelfen. Dazu kann man seine Farm Öffentlich oder privat listen. Dazu kommen noch Einstellungen wie: Was dürfen Gäste, was dürfen Steam-Freunde (Nur Anpflanzen und Ernten, auch Kaufen etc.)

Im großen und ganzen ist dieses Spiel eine niedliche Farm-Simulation wie Harvest Moon oder Stardew Valley. Nur gibt es keinen Storymodus. Gerne kann man Stunden damit verbingen, seine Farm zu vergrößern und zu Leveln. Wenn man keine Zeit hat und nur eben schnell abernten möchte, funktioniert dies auch ohne Probleme.

Ich persönlich bin auf jeden Fall gespannt, welche neuen Items noch hinzu kommen! Dank regelmäßiger Updates wird es bisher nicht langweilig. Klare Kaufempfehlung für die Leute, die gerne entspannt Farmen und friedliche Spiele mögen.

40858314.review:
I LOVE THIS GAME!!!!
It may not be perfect, but it's early access, so it's gonna have a few bugs.
I like many things about this game such as:
* It runs well
* Graphics are great for it being early access
* I love that its multiplayer, who doesn't like to farm with another person
* The animals are adorable
* Being on the tractor your able to plow, plant, water and harvest a 3x3 plot of land which makes things quick and easy.
Although there are a few things I don't like:
* The yellow square where you character is facing, I always accidently right click which plows a plot of land, which gets annoying sometimes.
* The season cycles are kinda weird for being only 17 minutes
*There's so many things that cost dimonds 
* When the seasons change it doesn't change much in the game, it just shows like leaves falling for fall or snowflakes falling for winter. I wish it would cover the ground and the plants or like change the color. Something like that.
But other than all that stuffs, it's an amazing game and I see so much potential in it becoming a great game in the future.
P.S. Sorry for all the spelling errors.

Farm Together to relaksująca gra dla osób, które lubią odprężyć się w wolnym czasie.
Kolorowa bajkowa grafika dodaje jej wiele uroku.

Zajmujesz się własną farmą od upraw warzyw, owoców po zwierzęta oraz tworzysz wyroby własne, nie zapomnę dodać też o upiększaniu farmy różnymi kosmetycznymi budowlami.
Bardzo szeroki potencjał gry, częste patche oraz dodawanie nowych upraw czy dekoracji sprawia, że gra nie nudzi się szybko.

40849585.review:
I bought this game because it's one I can play with a friend of mine who has a mac. And I have to say I definitely have fallen in love with it. I was a little hesitant because it had some seriously long grow times on some of the plants, but that's partially because everything continues to grow while you're offline and away from the game. The logical and strategist in me loves this, because I can plant some of my farm based on the quest I'm currently trying to finish but I can plant some of my farm based on when I might be on next. Like, if I know I'll be gone for a day/day and a half I'll plant the one day or two day crops because by the time I return they'll be finished. You don't HAVE to water your crops for them to grow, but if you do water them it knocks the grow time down - which I like. 

I'm really enjoying the game, and it's super relaxing to come home from a long day and just enjoy the really pretty graphics and relaxing music and tractor around with friends.

40812179.review:
SPIELPRINZIP

Das Spielprinzip ist simpel und einfach: Baue eine Farm auf und bewirtschafte sie. Möglichst mit vielen Freunden : )

FARM - Im Detail bedeutet das Felder mit vielen verschieden Obst- und Gemüsearten anlegen, Tiere kaufen und füttern, Bäume pflanzen und ernten und Fische in farmeigenen Teichen angeln. Dadurch verdient man Währung und erhält Ressourcen (Obst, Gemüse, Fisch, Milch etc.) welche in zugehörigen Ständen verkauft werden können. Außer Geld und diesen Ressourcen gibt es noch zwei weitere Währungen: Diamanten und Bänder. Diamanten erhält man wenn man Ressourcen an den jeweiligen Ständen verkauft, Bänder wenn man Quests abschließt oder ebenfalls beim Verkauf mancher Produkte.

Die Farm ist dabei völlig frei gestaltbar und kann nahezu beliebig oft erweitert werden in alle Himmelsrichtungen. Frei nach dem Prinzip „Kreativität bedeutet Freiheit!“ erhält man lediglich ein Stück Land um dieses dann nach eigenem Gusto zu bewirtschaften.

Dabei tickt alles im Takt der Jahreszeiten. Die Jahreszeit (als Uhr mit verschiedenen Symbolen angezeigt) bestimmt welches Gemüse angebaut werden kann und welche Bäume bereit zur Ernte sind. Dabei kommt das Spiel ohne lange Beschreibungen aus. Die Symbole unter dem Saatgut im Shop erklären sich von selbst! Einfach herrlich einfach.

TOGETHER! – Ja, hier wird im Titel auch schon ein Hauptaspekt des Spiels erwähnt. Zusammen! Zwar lässt sich mit etwas Organisation auch allein eine Farm aufbauen und bewirtschaften, aber wer will das schon? ; ) Zusammen macht es doch viel mehr Spaß und das ist auch so! 

STEUERUNG

Die Steuerung ist einfach und man hat sie schnell raus, sei es nun mit Controller (Ich spiele mit einem XBOX-One Controller am PC) oder Maus und Tastatur. Beide Steuerungsarten ergeben Sinn und erfüllen ihren Zweck zur vollsten Zufriedenheit.

GRAFIK

Die Grafik ist megaknuffig, bunt und einfach. 
Einfach ist in diesem Fall aber nicht schlecht, besonders wenn man sich auf dem momentanen Spielemarkt umsieht und in fast jedem Spiel nur noch lieblos hingeklatschte Texturen findet oder eine „realistische Grafik“ nach dem Motto „Gewollt aber nicht gekonnt.“ Die Leutchen hinter Farm Together haben sich diese Schmach erspart und auf eine wirklich simple aber eindrucksvolle Grafik gesetzt die einfach nur zum liebhaben und entspannen einlädt.

UPDATES

Von einem Early Access erwartet man regelmäßige Neuerungen und eine stetige Weiterentwicklung des Spiels. Bei vielen bisherigen Early Access-Spielen wurden diese Erwartungen extrem unterschritten oder ganz enttäuscht. Milkstone Studios leistet hier wirkliche Glanzleistungen! Erst gestern kam ein neues Update mit neuen Gegenständen, neuem Balancing und und und…! Damit hält man seine Spieler bei Laune und zeigt auch mit noch so „kleinen Neuerungen“ dass das Spiel weitergeht und weiterhin Arbeit reingesteckt wird! Weiter so! : ) 

PREIS

Für einen Vollpreis von 15 Euro erhält man hier ein wirklich schönes kooperatives Farm-Spiel zum Entspannen und Spaß haben. Von mir aus dürften die Entwickler ruhig mehr verlangen, denn hier wird super Arbeit geleistet! Die 15 Euro sind daher ein „Schnäppchen“ für Liebhaber! : )

ZUSAMMENFASSUNG

Abschließend bleibt nur zu sagen, klare Kaufempfehlung besonders zu diesem wirklich geringen Preis! Endlich ein Early Access Spiel, dass was aus sich macht!

40804744.review:
游戏本身挺不错的，挺悠闲、放松。配置要求也相对较低，画质也不错。
有几个想法不知道会不会采纳：
1、装饰性物品希望可以互动，比如凳子可以坐上去，房子可以开关门等等。
2、希望游戏内的拖拉机能升级之类的，让油更耐用，或者可操作面积加大等等。
3、希望草地、树木、建筑能随着天气变化外观，比如秋天树木落叶、草地枯黄、冬天房子积雪等等。
4、希望农作物有更多需求，比如需要施肥、需要驱虫等等。
5、如果能增加地形工具就更好了，可以把凸起的地方改斜坡或者抹平。

40800312.review:
Farm together can be a farming simulation, a social game, or an idle game according to your play style. As of now, its content is sufficient enough to support 40+ hours of non-stop play. The game focuses on interactions between players, eg. there is the built-in voice chat, however solo is still functional, or even fun for people who like grinding alone.

At early stage, you need to follow the quests in order to earn badges to build gas stations which are required for tractors. Tractors are essential in this game, unless you don’t mind the inconvenience, like picking hundreds of apples one by one. As you work your way solo or coop to higher levels, you will get access to three kinds of stalls which will sell the badges. A steady income of badges is more important than money and crystals, as the latter two will accumulate easily as your gas stations are built wherever needed.

Different activities in farming have their own cycles ranging from 10 minutes to 2 days while tending actions as intervals are optional. Farm levels are required to unlock new farm items, be it functional or decorative, which are raised through various activities performed on your farm. Personal levels can unlock new customization options for your tractor and farmer, which are earned through your activities on your or others’ farm.

40789401.review:
Piensa en los juegos de granjas que hay por ahí, como Stardew Valley, Harvest Moon, etc. Ahí tienes un tiempo límite por día, donde debes cosechar, recolectar, alimentar a tus animales así como convivir con tus vecinos, casarte, etc. 

Este juego pasa de todo eso y te pone a manejar tu propia granja, con estamina infinita, para que plantes y hagas de granja lo que quieras. Todo transcurre en tiempo real, así que si tu cultivo tarda 45 minutos, en 45 minutos en tiempo real estará para ser cosechado, sin embargo, tiene una característica importante, regar tus cultivos, lo cual reduce el tiempo que debes esperar para que tu cultivo esté cosechado.

Una vez consigues el tractor, las cosas son mucho más sencillas, pues en vez de ir casilla por casilla, tienes un 3x3 para casi todo.

Otro punto importante es que no hay microtransacciones, todo lo vas desbloqueando con tu esfuerzo. También hay objetos cosméticos para personalizar tu granjero y tu tractor, que si bien ya tiene varios, algunos más no estarían mal.

Si te gustan los juegos de granja, deberías probarlo.

I purchased this game less than a week ago and already have 40+ hours on it. I LOVED it. there are lots of pros but even more cons sadly. the game itself is adorable. I love the system and all the cute animals and animations of the charactor. It's relaxing over all and for awhile there i was addicted... here are my cons.

*my BIGGEST con is the fact that There needs to be way more decorative items like houses,benches,lawn chairs, ect. you are VERY limited with how creative you can get on your farm. the land is HUUUUGE but the decorating starts feeling repeatetive since you can only place a handful of decorative items. You find yourself looking around to make sure you aren't putting windmills or fountains too close together.

-*Once you get so much money and dimonds, the game gets boring. No reason to harvest anything. No more goals.
you just decorate and then eventually get bored.

-* i see no point in people helping others on the farm. You don't get very much out of it. All exp and crops go to their farm.
there should be a rewards system for helping others. or quests that want you to help others.

-* i want easier. faster quests. The ones we have now, take days to complete if you are needing to harvest 100 watermelon that take 2 real life days to grow.
Some quests like farmville or happy acre have would be nice. Have to actually make goodies with the crops you grow to fill orders. keeps you busy .

(so my most important cons that i wish the developers would take notice to are decerative items and quests,)

Although this is a mobile port it looks stunning and is really a lot of fun for me and my 5yo Daughter to play together.

Only issue I have is that it plays like a monile game right now, hopefully it will become a bit more realistic.

For example;
- Rain does not water the crops.
- The draw distance for crops needs to be more; It's easy to walk past some crops & not know they need water for example.

That being said, it really does look wonderful and it is easy enough that my 5yo can play alone but also fun enough that we can p[lay together.

All in all this is a brilliant Family Freindly game that won't bore the parents too much either.  

Highly recommended!

40760446.review:
Очень симпатичная игрушка с непродуманными экономикой и геймплеем.
Дело в том что тратить деньги некуда кроме как вкладываться в посадки новых культур, на кристаллы покупаются украшательства для фермы, но их очень скоро становится уж очень много - можно хоть всю территорию застроить ветряными мельницами, можно также купить соседние территории но... зачем это всё? Зачем мне новые культуры и новые территории если даже тот урожай что есть я едва успеваю собирать и трактор нифига не спасает потому как даже в zippo бензина можно залить больше чем в его чёртов бак.
 Здесь можно выращивать грибы - ставим на участке засохшие деревья и на них вырастают мухоморы, которые при сборе определяются как "орехи". Коровы достаточно большие животные и заспавнившись на каждой выделенной под них клетке устраивают столпотворение, садки с рыбой мне показались странным новшеством - начиная от подбора рыб (угри, глубоководные удильщики, пираньи и кои - это не выглядит как обычный набор аквариумиста) и заканчивая мизерным уловом, от ульев толку также немного - пчёлы приносят мёд, по-видимому, раз в реальный год. Со временем в игре вообще полная жoпa - какие-то растения созревают десять минут, а какие-то 2 РЕАЛЬНЫХ дня - и это ненормально, особенно если учесть что сезоны здесь меняются раз в семнадцать минут. 
 СЕМНАДЦАТЬ минут, Карл! Этот факт меня вообще из колеи выбил, почему, чёрт побери, семнадцать? Если бы было двадцать или пятнадцать - вопросов бы не возникло, но семнадцать? Разработчики с какой, вообще, планеты?!

 И, несмотря на всё вышесказанное, я рекомендую эту игру. Я рекомендую её за графическую составляющую, ненавязчивую музыку и общий позитивный настрой.

P.S.
Задачи разработчикам:
1) Придумайте куда тратить триллионы местных денег и кристаллов.
2) НЕОБХОДИМЫ помощники для сбора урожая со всех бесчисленных грядок.
3) Повысьте полезность трактора - она стремится к нулю и это неправильно, сделайте ему скорость выше человеческой, что ли. Может быть вообще нужно несколько видов транспорта?
4) Противники, быть может? Волки пытающиеся забраться в коровник, лисы таскающие кур?  Вредители, там, вороны, гусеницы? Не?
5) ... больше... всего? Да, всего - растений, украшений, собственный дом - может быть?
6) Погладьте по головкам моделлеров - они справились на "ура".

40759912.review: 我曾在机场手持S686连杀数人，整个military base唯我称王；我曾在海拉尔大陆驰骋荒野，击败大魔王拯救等待着我的公主；我还曾在天辉高地两极反转困住敌方五人，享受队友山呼海啸般的呐喊……而如今，我只是一个满手污泥的小男孩，一刻不停歇地耕地、播种、浇水、收获。我所感受到的，只是这一方天地里的每一片树叶，每一棵鲜花，每一朵暮云，还有偶然回过头跟在我身后的一只发着微光，翩翩起舞的蝴蝶。我们都终究要沉静下来，去体验日升日落，四季变换，平凡得一如我们的人生。

40758829.review:
รีวิวเกม Farm to gether ฟาร์มสูบวิญญาณ 2018 ช่วงนี้มีเกมแนวๆทำฟาร์มออกมาหลายเกมมากเลยนะครับ ก็ซื้อมาลองเล่นหมดทุกเกมรู้สึกไม่อินและไม่สนุกเท่าเกมนี้เลย เล่นครั้งแรกว่าจะลองเล่นเฉยๆ รู้สึกตัวอีกทีผ่านไป 5 ชั่วโมงรวด แม่เจ้านี้มันเกิดอะไรขึ้น !!!
.
เกมนี้เป็นเกมที่เล่นง่ายมากกกกก.... แค่ขุดดินแล้วปลูกผักหรือผลไม้แล้วก็รอเก็บเกี่ยวแค่นั้นเองหลักๆมาแค่นี้ แต่ความสนุกของมันคือมันจะให้เราบริหารฟาร์ม คำนวนเรื่องของเวลา คำนวนเรื่องของรายได้ รวมไปถึงวิจัยสิ่งของต่างๆ พอเราเวลอัพเราก็จะสามารถเลี้ยง ปลา/ไก่/เป็ด/วัว/หมู ในเกมมีเยอะมากครับ แต่ละอย่างได้ผลผลิตที่ขายได้ราคาต่างกันออกไป
.
ส่วนของวิจัยต่างๆในเกมหากเราสร้างพวกร้านค้าจะได้เพรชตอบแทนกลับมาเรื่อยๆตามระยะเวลาที่กำหนด เพรชพวกนี้มันจะนำไปซื้อพวกของแต่งบ้านได้ครับ เกมนี้ไม่ต้องเติมเงินซื้อเพรชถ้าบริหารดีๆเพรชเหลือเยอะมากครับ และถ้าหากเราสร้างปั้มน้ำมันได้เราจะสามารถเอารถไถมาใช้ในไร่ของเราได้ สามารถขุดดินพร้อมกันหลายๆช่อง ปลูกหลายๆช่อง รดน้ำหลายๆช่อง พูดง่ายๆคือมันลดระยะเวลาในการทำฟาร์มนั้นเอง
.
ความสนุกของเกมนี้อีกอย่างก็คือหากเราเวลอัพตามที่กำหนดแล้ว เราจะสามารถขยายที่ดินของเราได้ครับ แต่ละที่ดินจะมีภูมิประเทศที่ไม่เหมือนกัน เพราะฉนั้นการที่จะเลือกเปิดสักแผนที่เราต้องคิดให้ดีครับ สำหรับความคิดของผมเกมนี้ยิ่งขยายที่ดินทำสวนมองดูจากด้านบนยิ่งดูสวยงามมากครับ
.
เกมนี้เวลอัพไม่ได้มีแค่ปลูกผักวิจัยของหรือสร้างร้านค้าขยายที่ดินหรือเลี้ยงสัตว์ได้อย่างเดียว พอเวลอัพเกมนี้ยังสามารถสร้างสิ่งของที่เป็นแฟชั่นในการแต่งสวนได้เช่นถนน สระน้ำ หุ่นใล่กา กังหันลม มีเป็นสิบอย่างเลยครับ เกมนี้มันค่อนข้างเล่นเพลินมากฆ่าเวลาได้เป็นอย่างดี เหมือนจะไม่ค่อยมีอะไรให้ทำเยอะ แต่สนุกเกินคาด
.
และสิ่งที่ขาดไม่ได้เลยคือเพื่อนๆเราสามารถเข้ามาช่วย co-op สร้างฟาร์มของเราได้ และยังไม่พอครับ 1 ฟาร์มมีผู้เล่นสูงสุด 16 คนโคตรเยอะ !!!! แถมยังเปิดไมค์คุยกันในเกมได้ และไม่ต้องกลัวว่าคนอื่นจะเข้ามาทำลายฟาร์มของเรา เราสามารถตั้งค่าฟาร์มได้ว่าคนที่เข้ามาจะมีสิทธิ์ในการทำอะไรกับฟาร์มเราได้แค่ไหน ซึ่งในส่วนนี้เราก็จัดการเองได้เช่นกัน แต่ยังไงก็ระวังเกรียนไว้หน่อยก็แล้วกันครับ
.
ถึงแม้ว่าเกมนี้จะไม่มีเนื้อเรื่อง แต่เกมนี้จะมีเควสให้เราทำครับ ซึ่งค่าตอบแทนของเควสจะเป็นค่าของเกียรติยศซึ่งมันเอาไปแลกเป็นของวิจัยบางอย่างได้ และแต่ละเควสก็ค่อนข้างน่าสนใจครับ อาจจะต้องใช้เวลาในการทำแต่ก็เพลินและสนุกไปกับมันได้ แถมต้องวางแผนในการทำสวนอีกด้วย
.
ส่วนดนตรีประกอบเกมนี้ ถ้าผมให้เพลงประกอบยอดเยี่ยมที่ดีที่สุดแห่งปี 2017 คงเป็น Cuphead ส่วนปี 2018 คงเป็นเกม Farm to gether เกมนี้แน่นอนครับ ดนตรีฟังสบายมาก เสียงกีต้าคอเบาๆ ดนตรีออกไปแนวคันทรี่ฟังง่ายรู้สึกรีเรคอย่างมากเลยครับ คือค่อนข้างประทับใจอย่างมากจริงๆ
.
สรุป เกมภาพสวย อนิเมชั่นตัวละครทำออกมาดี เกมเพลย์สนุก สนุกแบบเกิดคาดอะ ข้อเสียคงไม่มีครับนึกไม่ออกจริงๆว่าจะเอาอะไรมาติ ถ้าให้ติคงเป็นของตกแต่งฉากที่ค่อนข้างน้อยละมั้ง ส่วนเพลงประกอบก็ฟังแล้วโคตรเพลิน ดูดเวลาชีวิตได้ดีมากๆ คะแนน 10/10 คะแนน (นี้เหละเกมปลูกผักที่หามานาน) เพิ่มเติม : เป็นเกมแรกที่ผมให้คะแนน 10/10 ในรอบ 2 ปี

40751638.review:
The game is very casual to play. You can spend hours playing it a day, or just a few hours a day depending on what you plant. The game is very calming, you can't really rage at the game. Think farmville, without spending real money and annoying your friends to come help you on the farm.

The game is Multiplayer if you want it to be. My wife and I have our own farms, but we help each other out so it doesn't take long to plant and water. You can spend a lot of time watering your plants and grinding at first, but as time goes on you can check back on the farm in a few days. The game does count for real time for crops. So if it says two days, it will take two days for them to grow, unless you water them. Depending on the plant, it will speed it up a lot or a little.

I would say if you are into grindy games, have time on your hands, and want to play a casual game, then pick this game up.

40747606.review: A good game just to sit back, chill and farm!

40747505.review:
Time of review - 11Mar18 (Early Access)

[b]Farm Together is most definitely a casual experience.[/b] Do not expect the most realistic or brutally challenging simulation game to grace your game collection. It does what it set out to do: provide a stressless escape into micromanaging a farm.

I'd recommend giving it a try if you like casual games, but be warned, it does get thoroughly addictive. Whilst it is selling itself as a multiplayer shindig, I think that you make the most out of it with singleplayer ventures as well. (You could have a blast treating it solely as singleplayer.)

[u]More details about the game:[/u]

You start with a small plot of land, a wad of cash and some cabbages. Actions such as plowing grass tiles, planting crops and picking crops will earn you experience points (towards you and the farm). As your farm levels up, you unlock a greater range of crops to grow, animals to care for, trees to curate, fish to fry and buildings to...build. There's decoration items too so that you can create just the kind of farm you want. As your character levels up, you unlock more customisation for you and your tractor (which is used to work many tiles at once).

During game-time, there are four seasons, each lasting 17 minutes. (An in-game year is a little over a real-time hour.) The season restricts what crops/animals/trees/etc. you have to dispense from your arsenal. Later unlockables get either more pricey or take longer to grow -- some as long as 2 real-time days. Watering crops & trees reduces that timer thankfully.

The multiplayer experience is somewhat...limited. Your benefit (apart from playing with friends) is player experience -- all other earnings go toward the hosting player's farm. There's a good level of control to stop people sabotaging your farm, and you can set your farm to be publicly visible or private. Friends on Steam can join private farms with the Join Game tool. There's in-game chat and voice-chat too, if that's your thing.

It is currently early access and is definitely not bug free, but the bugs aren't gamebreakers and shouldn't detract from the game.

40733508.review:
[h1]Farm Together[/h1]

Farming games have been popping up like clockwork on the Steam store as of late, and with the hit success of the indie legend [i]Stardew Valley[/i] who can really blame the trend? The [i]Harvest Moon[/i] inspired genre has always been around, but the aforementioned title has revolutionized the formula in a lot of ways while adding the addictive layer of social interaction known from titles like [i]Animal Crossing[/i] and [i]The Sims[/i]. The intensive and addictive day-to-day farming aspect combined with the engaging social interaction has made for a wonderful genre of complex small town life simulators.

One of the newer additions to this trend is [i]Farming Together[/i], it offers the purest and most simple farming formula with the added benefit of being able to seemlessly visit or have others visit your personal property and give a helping hand. Does it hold up to the farming competition? I would say this is more than worth the time for fans of the genre.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

[i]Farm Together[/i] is so much more accessible than its farming predecessors, that much I can tell right away. Gone are the tedious trips back and forth from a store, barrelling through the same dialogue everyday just to buy a few seeds. Everything in [i]Farm Together[/i] is streamlined into a quick and accessible menu, with a tap of a button you're able to select and plant the appropriate seeds to your liking so long as you have the needed income to do so.

The initial steps are just as you'd expect; you plow the land, till the soil, you plant the seeds, you water the crops, and then you harvest your bounty. And best yet, all of it is done with the single click of the mouse. Just like the seed purchasing system, everything is streamlined into simple and quick single button presses making the entire experience in Farm Together incredible smooth. It's also nice because it reduces on a lot of the grind in games with farming, as you don't spend nearly as much time working your way up various tool trees and upgrades. This is pure farming in every sense, and the focus is completely on the growing and expansion of your massive crops. It's really incredibly satisfying!

Soon enough access to the tractor is gained allowing you to move faster as well as work multiple tiles at a time. As you can imagine this speeds up the entire process ten-fold, making for some serious quick and engaging expansion and building of your crops and farms. New seeds for different seasons become available as you continue to level up which yield various harvesting times and acquired gold, vending tables are built which turn your crops into diamonds spent on larger more game changing buildings and cosmetics, animals including fish can be maintained for different resources and all of it levels up the more you harvest, yielding more money in the long run.

The repetitive yet progressively addictive process of farming earns you money by the day, which is quickly spent replenishing your crops. If you plan your crops accordingly and take value and harvesting time into consideration you should pull in slightly more than you put into it each season, which will allow a very enjoyable and satisfying expansion of land. This can either be by increasing the size of your crops, planting groves of fruit bearing trees, or using diamonds to build more cosmetic expansions such as gravel roads, lamps to light the paths at night, fenceposts, or any number of decisions for increasing your farming wealth or just having fun and making the place look a little more to your liking.

[h1]Visuals/Sound[/h1]

The game has a simple and charming look to it, the character designs have a very western and almost Sims-like design to them ditching the usual retro [i]Harvest Moon[/i] inspired aesthetic along with a fair bit of fun personalization supplied through the farmer customization. As far as farming games go the vegetables and different crops you actually plant look detailed and vibrant and generally more realistic than the usual indie 2d farming, making them even more appealing to pluck and harvest. Especially in later stages when the lush green leaves and vibrantly colored vegetables and fruits are lined up by the hundreds, forming a huge and decadent farm of color this is again an incredibly satisfying experience, and seeing the bounty of your hard work fully bloom all together pushes you on to unlock more seeds and crops and expand your own personal farm even further.

The usual countryside sounds fill the air here, with crickets chirping through the night and small birds greeting you in the morning. It has a very folksy acoustic soundtrack to supplement your farming, and while relaxing and very appropriate for the natural and down-to-earth mood of the game I found the game more suitable for zoning out to with your own favorite music. Overall the sights and sounds of Farm Together all add perfectly to the already nature-centric and very countryside feeling of the game, it's as immersive as it is addicting.

[h1]Final Thoughts[/h1]

After playing a good portion of the most beloved farming games on the market this seems to be the one I can't stop coming back to. It's just so easy to get sucked into, without any of the extra fluff or filler of other farming games to complicate the matter you never forget where you were or what you were doing. It's just the purest form of plain and simple farming with the easiest of controls and the least amount of tedium possible, allowing you to focus completely on making your farm as huge, as bountiful, and as beautiful as possible. If this genre is your thing, absolutely give this a try especially if you have a friend or to to join you on the trip.

[/i]

40720993.review:
In this game, cows occasionally build ladders with themselves in an attempt to get back home. And of course, their true home is on the moon. All cows are told of the stories of their ancestors who lived free on the moon and the great cow warrior who met his demise, burning in the Earth's atmosphere during re-entry after attempting to jump to the moon. In theory, it should have worked. The warrior cow plummeted off a cliff, into the bellies of thousans of cattle below. This cow is held in the highest of regards, and granted the most honorable medal the cows can award. The Freedom Badge. 

Imagine yourself being a cow, gazing into the starry sky thinking of what it must be like to live in harmony, peace, and freedom. One day, young calf, one day your people will return to their natural habitat. The serene, peaceful plains on the moon will once again be claimed by the cows.

I look forward to seeking you out with a telescope in the night sky, and then wiping the tear that slowly trickles down my face.

Fear not, for it will not be a tear of sorrow, but one of joy. Thinking of how happy the cows must be to have been returned home. It will be a glorious and celebratory day, when the cows get back home.

Gra polega na sadzeniu i zbieraniu tego co posadzimy lub wyhodujemy. Czyli codzienna praca rolnika. Mamy system levelowania farmy, naszych zbiorów i nas samych. Ale co nam to daje? Jak narazie nic, poza dostepem do nowych przedmiotów i terenów. Nie ma czegoś takiego jak odblokowanie umiejetności, wyposażenia dla postaci czy rozbudowa budynków. Jedynie dostajemy mozliwość zmiany wyglądu naszego awatara i traktora.
Gra posiada jeszcze system questów, za które oprócz kasy i expa dostajemy medale. Za medale możemy kupic unikalne budynki, a w nich sprzedać zebrane surowce. Oprócz tego kupujemy ozdobniki. Za sprzedaż surowców dostajemy diamenty, które mogą nas zmylić że w grze istnieją mikrotransakcje. Na szczęscie ich nie ma, ale poza tym to typowy klikacz przeniesiony z FB.
Nie ma czegoś takiego jak automatyzacja, do szybszego zbierania słuzy nam traktor którego musimy zatankować, a potem i tak pozostaje nam ręczne zbieranie surowców. Patrząc na obszar jaki mamy do zdobycia to jesli nie mamy grupy do grania to zabije nas nuda albo padnie nam myszka. 
Dlatego jestem na nie. Brakuje tylko systemu znajomych, aby całkowicie skreślić tą grę.

40637576.review:
If you're looking at this game and you see the clone of a facebook game, I have this to say to you: You're not entirely wrong. This game is very much like many of your standard farm-em-up games with two major exceptions:

1) Multiplayer. Farming with your friends and hopping back and forth between each other's farms accounts for more than half of what makes this game more enjoyable than those look-alikes. I have been playing the game with a friend all along. He and I between the two of us only have (at the time of this writing) a combined ~24 hours in game. We simply switch from being farm-hand to farmer and vice versa constantly and have even helped each other design certain aspects of our farms.

The multiplayer permissions system, simple though it may be, is setup perfectly for a game of this type. You have a single selection for overall permissions for your friends, and one for guests to your farms (should you choose to make your farm public, that is). I have given my friend full control over my farm, he can add to it as though it were his own and he has done the same for me. We both have permissions off for guests, however. They can look around our farms but cannot harvest our crops or build anything new.

If you're a complete hermit and don't want any contact with the outside world, you can set your farm to private. It's slightly hidden behind menu options but it is doable. On the main menu, just click on "My Farms" and then hit the settings button for your selected farm. There you can set the farm to private and no one will be able to join you through the menu (Friends can still join through Steam, if you're online)

2) It's third person. It's not top down point-and-click trash like those other games. The fact that you actually have to walk around your farm to complete tasks rather than just pan a camera across the landscape means that time passes in between actions and instead of having to idle for five minutes just to wait for your crops to finish growing, that time amounts to the time spent walking from field to field.

With the right crop layout you can set up a rotation from field to field that spans the length of time between seasons, and although the seasons are relatively short - my one complaint with this game - it might be more game-breaking to lengthen them than to keep them as they are.

Those two points aside, it's still a very well polished game for having released less than a month ago. I have run across very few bugs, and those that I have were mostly created with the devs adding new features to the game and said bugs were fixed promptly.

TL;DR

Pros
-Very good time killer game
-Great fun alone, 10x more fun with friends
-Simple enough to pick up very quick
-Third person instead of point and click
-Permissions system for multiplayer
-Can make your farm private if you so choose

Cons
-Short-ish seasons
-Ducklings are hungry ass bastards

I will conclude with a warning, though. This game can tend to be very addicting. It will eat your life away. You will forget to sleep. You will forget to eat. You're hungry? So are your ducklings. You should probably feed them first. And also the cows. And the chickens. And oh, the cotton is ready to be harvested...it's right here next to the chickens. And you should probably go ahead and replant it while you're at it, just so that the field isn't sitting empty. Won't take long....

10/10 would forget the real world exists again

40615670.review:
USER HAS OVER 100 HOURS INTO GAME

Incredibly addicting game to play. Highly recommended. 

However, the game is still new, so PLEASE understand that expanding the farm and decorating it is a great thing to do, but once you hit level 30 or so, you will run out of free time to do everything to keep up on your farm. This makes you required to stay logged in for long periods of time if you want to expand your farm and be as efficient as possible. 

There is a lack of things added to the game (not the devs fault - the game is still new). My recommendation is to enjoy the game at your leisure, but until they create ways to run your farm more efficiently, don't get too sucked into it. Money has no value, diamonds have no use, and medals are simply stockpiling in hopes something extraordinary will be created for us to buy.

40613948.review:
2018/3/07現在までのレビュー

【良い点】

①十分な広さのマップで好きな位置で農業したり牧畜したり、それなりに自分好みの農場or村を作れる。

②作りこまれたBGMは、ゆったりとしておりゲームにのめりこみやすい。

③パッと他人のワールドにお邪魔できる！しかし、基本的に他人は作業できないような初期設定になっている為、観覧モードです笑

④忙しい人やヒマな人、両者とも楽しめるgoodなゲーム設計。

※作物や牧畜での収穫・収入はリアルタイムで何十分～何時間かかります。
長いものだと二日かかるものもある。
その為、時間がある人は収穫までの時間が短い野菜や動物をメインで育てれば良いし、時間があまり無い人は収穫までの時間が長いものを選択すればよい。

野菜への水やりをすれば収穫までの時間を短縮できるが、水やりをしなくても枯れたり、動物のエサが無くても死んだりすることはないので本当に自分のペースでできます。


【改善点】

①クラフトで町作りが好きな私ですが、現段階ではあまり建築物の種類は多くない。
また、設置できる建築物も完成されたものをポン置きで拡張性が一切無い。

②コスパの良い農作物や動物を理解した後はひたすら増やして増やしてお金を稼ぐ作業ゲーが始まります。
アップデートで増えるであろう建築物が現在は少ない為、お金が貯まる一方で使い道はありません笑

【総評】

良ゲーだが現在はコンテンツ不足感が否めない。
興味がある人はもうしばらく寝かせて大きいアプデが入ってから購入してもいいかもしれません。

40602270.review:
活到二十岁，对外界的意见就不那么看重了，反而开始想认真的探究自己的心之所向。最近总是想起一个广为流传的故事：一个放羊娃，正在放羊，当问及他长大了梦想是什么？他说要养更多的羊。很多人觉得这是个笑话，我之前也觉得，直到发现自己就是那个放羊娃，人生的每个决定看似偶然，实则都是必然的，很有命运的意味，以往的经历都是今日的伏笔，比如我开了一个农场。
开局你就有了农场，一锄一地得开始围着土地、蔬菜转。每天鞋底、衣服和指甲缝里都是泥土。我有20亩地，说起来一副很富有的表情，其中9亩胡萝卜地，柠檬树很小还不怎么挂果，樱桃林里堆放着鸡粪，施肥用的，夏天鸡粪里会生蛆，好奇并且不嫌臭可以去瞧瞧。剩下的地用来种蔬菜和玉米，今年的玉米被鸟吃光了，因为附近几公里都没有种玉米的，所以鸟们都爱来我这吃。蔬菜种了好多种，比如茄子、尖椒、黄瓜、萝卜、红薯、芹菜等等。有的蔬菜味道很好闻，比如芹菜，摘过芹菜的手、拉过芹菜的汽车都会香一整天。紫苏也是，到了秋天紫苏会开小小的花，风一吹，香满整个院子，紫苏的果子很像芝麻，个子小小的，香味的能量却很大。

Ферма БЕЗ доната, она существует ) молодцы так держать )
Есть несколько ложек дегтя в этой бочке меда.
1. В игре нечего делать когда дошел до 30-40 лвл фермы.
2. Много культур только толку от них никакого, в конце вся ваша ферма будет утыкана сливовыми деревьями или коровниками для фарма розовых медалек, которые девать то и некуда.
3. Глупая экономическая состовляющая игры. 
4. Рыба, куры и утки, свиньи, цветы и овощи, орехи и шелк, всё это в игре нужно только для фарма кристалов которых в игре вагон и тележка. Разработчик каждую неделю дабавляет новые культуры, вопрос только зачем, от того что дабавят ещё 100-200 культур ничего не измениться.
5. Онлайн. Нет никакого взаимодействия с другими фермерами. Заходить на чужую ферму и работать там просто так, такое себе занятие )) 

Игра забавная, но пока слишком пустая. Если разрабы так и будут каждую неделю тупо добавлять новое дерево и какую нибудь картошку, тогда пичалька.

40588725.review:
O jogo é muito maneiro, mas temos que lembrar que ele ainda está em acesso antecipado.
Vamos aos pontos.
O jogo está aparentemente rodando perfeito, não encontrei nenhum bug aparente, apenas um problemas nas conexões quando começa a jogar com muita gente, as vezes o servidor trava e você tem que reiniciar, é um pouco chato mas aceitável pelo fato de estar ainda em early
Sobre o balanceamento do jogo acho que ainda falta muito, se você jogar com muita gente (como é no meu caso que sou streamer) o jogo acaba rápido com seus "recursos", ou seja, em menos de 2 dias de jogo você consegue basicamente tudo e sobra muito dinheiro, mas eu acredito que isso é facilmente resolvido adicionando novos produtos e espero que tenha como gastar todo a grana adquirida
O fato de poder jogar com alguém é insanamente legal, achei incrível essa ideia e ficou bem maneiro, acredito que se você estiver com 2-3 amigos que joguem sempre o balanceamento do jogo está perfeito e vai garantir horas de diversão, se você jogar sozinho vai ter centenas de horas até terminar tudo na sua fazenda, mas pra quem curtia um farm ville é uma grande nostalgia em 3d e multiplayer.
O jogo não tem nehuma história, então é isso, plantar, colher, plantar colher, se você gosta esse jogo é pra você, se não, sugiro esperar alguma história que possivelmente deve ser lançado mais pra frente

40573380.review:
Overall Great Game!  However,  a few mechanics in the game stop it from becoming a huge success in my opinion.

CONS:
1. Once you passed the tutorial phase, you stand around a lot waiting for harvest. (or run around aimlessly)
2. You can reach the end game (final plants/crops/trees/livestock/ect..)  in about 3 days.  Nothing to really do afterwards.
3. Pointless currency (crystals, will explain further below)


PROS:
1. Can play with friends
2. Great game for those looking for a 30/45 min game session
4. Easy game to play while doing other things (Cleaning, Homework, etc..)
4. Great game for those who like to organize!!!!
5. Reasonable pricetag
6. Fun for all ages.

EXPLINATIONS:
First off, once you pass the tutorial phase,  It can take hours or even days before crops are ready for harvest.  The only thing you can do while waiting is to decorate your farm, orgainze your farm, or feed your livestock.  Besides that, you can run around admiring your farm.  A simple mini game would help pass the downtime.  

Secondly,
The crystals, Absolutely pointless!  The crystals are a currency used to buy cosmetics for your farm.  The crystals are earned in-game and rather quickly.  You will have more then you will ever need very quick!!  The crystals are also used to buy vendor type shops to sell your crops and earn my crystal.  Thats it.  I would prefer to get rid of the crystals and use the gold for all of the transactions. More thought would go into planting/harvesting because you will need to manage your gold.  Would require more thought into playing the game.

Finally,
Once you've reach around farm level 10(mid-game plants), Thats when the long waits begin.  You can log in, harvest everything; Plant all your crops; water all your crops.  Then just log out.  Definetly convenient for those with tight schedules and looking to play a game with slow progression.


OVERALL:
This is a great game with lots of potential.  Lots of options to chose from when farming, which allows for a great farm.  Would love to see something implemented into the game during wait times.  Great simulation game.  Everyone who loves simulation should give this a try.

40555853.review:
This is a fantastic game. It sucks you in without you even noticing.

It might feel slighly shallow in the beginning but as you get levels and unlock new things, it starts to feel like there's always something to look forward to, which keeps you playing more and more.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Gorgeous looking game, even when using the lower level settings.
[*]The music is very fitting for this kind of game. Chill and relaxing.
[*]The more you play, the more things there are to do.
[*]The 4, 17 minute season system is fantastic for what the game wants you to do.
[*]The gameplay and sense of progressions feels rewarding
[*]Diverse online multiplayer playability
[*]Quest system is beautifly done
[*]The usage of different currency for buildings is a great way to go about doing it
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1] ([u]This is more of a letter to the developers but also a good look into some of the problems you might find in the game[/u])
[list]
[*]The resource system could use some changes to be more appealing
[*]Higher level animals are only good for money, completely useless for resources (Lower level animals are far better for this due to harvest times being shorter and food being cheaper)
[*]Everything is harvestable/plantable as a group of 9 with the tractor [b]EXCEPT[/b] for anything animal related, which can feel quite tedious
[*]When you get large groups of animals together, you have to stay there and press the interac button several times to get them fully stocked in food, which can also feel tedious
[*]The fuel system/tractor need to scale in some way, either by making the tractor's tank bigger or by making the tractor faster
[/list]

Overall, this game is amazing for people who are looking to spend time in a chill, casual, farming game. Keep in mind that the game is still in the early access stage, so it has a lot of room to improve, but it's already a great game. I'd rate it 8/10.

40531037.review:
无论是音乐，美术，还是手感都俱佳的农场模拟来了！
夏有萤火冬有雪，完全沉浸在美妙的耕耘以及布置之中，放空自己，感受无与伦比的宁静美丽。

令人惊叹的是游戏刚上线没多久制作组就积极听取玩家意见，在短短两周的时间里，添加了包括官方中文在内的诸多更新。多格移动以及多格删除功能的火速上线立即让人重新装修的欲望瞬间高涨。



美术9/10
其实我认为完全可以给10分，但因为本游戏人设偏欧美口味，去掉的一分仅仅是由于可能亚洲日系玩家不会太喜欢人物的风格。
无论是昼夜表现、环境光照、动态天气都让农场变成一副优美的风景画，使人徜徉其中流连忘返。
作为一个2月23日正式上线的游戏，官方在3月8日就推出了农场主&拖拉机的自定义外观功能，十分令人称赞，相信之后还会添加更多有趣的选项。
 
音乐10/10
优美可人的BGM，可爱生动的音效，即使如我的朋友那般从早上睁眼种田种到深夜，也丝毫不会觉得厌倦。

玩法8/10
游戏主要玩法是以耕耘获取金币钻石，解锁全新的种植养殖产品、装饰品及功能性小建筑。
前期一己之力耕耘一某三分地，获取加油站后可以使用拖拉机快速高效地完成9格耕耘。关键这是个可以联机的游戏，
于是在伙伴们的互助之下，你将拓展属于你自己的雄大农场王国！

然而作为一个抢先体验版本，虽然作为核心玩法的种田本身其实可以花费大量游玩时间，但是由于玩法比较单一，即是种植收获&购买摆件。
所以他的游戏乐趣更类似于前几年很火的那些挣取金币并且购买装饰品建筑的手游和小型页游。在讨论版咨询之后，得到回复是目前可能没有故事模式及主线剧情的计划。

====================TIPS=======================
》按ESC可看到下面有任务，完成一个任务可获得2个奖励币购买一个加油站。加油站主要是给拖拉机加油，在实施多格操作的时候起着主要作用。
建议首先积极清任务，将获取的加油站分开摆在不同区域以方便没油时候及时加油。
》目前使用拖拉机可一次性种植9块地。更新之后删除也是同样操作，可同时删除9块。多格移动是离开拖拉机在人物模式下对着要移动的地一块块按Z，再到需要放置的地方一块块放下去。
》懒人推荐养鱼塘，无论养多少格，一键收割。
》新手前期很容易不注意作物成本和收获时间而去盲种，导致瞬间没钱。这时候建议多用钻买水井，一次刷25块钱，2分钟一次，刷到钱以后迅速种下15元一格的生菜，短时间内度过经济危机。
》ESC下的农场设定请尽早设定，尤其不要给游客开放太多权限，有些恶人会来你家拆加油站的哦~
》前期不用吝啬钻石，多买购物点迅速获得经验。后期购物点提供的钻石数量非常多，完全不会担忧需要攒钻的问题。并且对于园林爱好者来说，早点用钻石铺设道路，在增加XP的同时也完成了最优先的道路规划，一举两得。
》一个有趣的事实是人物跑步速度比拖拉机快。并且人可以翻越栅栏和水面，而拖拉机不能，只能开在平地与道路上。
》游戏地形目前不能修改，请尽早规划道路和空间。每块地周围出现的木牌表示人物到达几级以后可以开拓一块新的地域，四面都有，选择自由。所以规划时候也可将下一块地的主干道规划入内。
》浇水只能加速作物收货时间，不浇也不会导致作物枯萎，并且目前版本浇水不会获得经验或其他奖励。对于需要种植一两天时间才能收获的作物来说，不需要太浪费汽油去浇水。
》从庄稼上奔跑也并不会导致压到作物，请尽情放飞。
》目前游戏ESC菜单里直接邀请玩家不知为何一直失败，加入好友房间的方式是寻找房间——ALT删选——选择好友。


作为个人喜好，同时也有很多玩家反馈，希望游戏可以加入诸如可以投资的房产并且给与玩家内装的玩法。制作组表示已经收到了建议并且正在积极考虑之中，尽情期待！

相信以制作组的丰富诚意和巨大的更新热情，这款游戏不需要太久就能成为新一代种田大业的地标游戏。并且这是一款建造/经营/模拟爱好者或者强迫症玩家毫不犹豫就可入手的上佳之作。

40530421.review:
どちらにするか非常に迷ったのですが、ぎりぎりでおすすめしない方にしておきます。

内容としてはF2Pの農業ゲームから一切の課金要素を取り払い、それにあわせてバランスを調整したものとなります。コインを消費して土地を耕し、種を撒いて時折水をやり、作物ごとに設定された生育時間が経つと収穫できるようになりコインが手に入ります。17分で1日、1季節となっており作物によっては特定の季節にしか植えられないものもあります。時間の流れはプレイしていない間も有効です。放置しておいても成長が止まったり作物が枯れたりすることはありません。家畜や釣りの要素もありますが、基本的にやることは畑でやることと大きな違いはありません。

課金なしに気楽に遊べるのはいいのですが、それを削ったかわりに追加された何かがあるわけではなくて、プレイヤーが工夫することで効率化したり高い収益が得られたりということがないのが非常に残念なところです。基本的に何かボタンを押していれば儲かるバランスで、工夫の余地があるとすれば農園の飾り付けくらいでしょう。
協力プレイ可能で、フレンドだけでなく見知らぬ他人の農園を手助けにいったり逆に自分の農園に手助けに来たりするのですが、前述の通り飾り付けして楽しむくらいしかやることがないのでフレンド以外とやって盛り上がるかは疑問です。

まだ早期アクセスが開始されたばかりなので今後拡張されていく可能性はありますが、現時点では「F2Pの農業ゲーを買い切りでやりたい」というピンポイントな欲求を持つ人でなければ長くは楽しめないと思います。

40527695.review:
Farmville, Happy Farms....Eat your hearts out.  There's a new game on the block and it is better than you guys.

Now you are wondering why am I saying this and what do I mean? Well I will tell you.

This game may well be early access with a few issues at the moment but they are not game risking issues and for what they have vigen themselves as a baseline for a most awesome farming game is....well....unbelievable.

Here are some Pro's and con's for you to chew over before you think about getting the game.

Pro's:  Costs £11+ not expensive at all in my eyes
Pro's: Quests, there are a great deal of them at the moment
Con's: Not enough farming Items....in all categories (though I expect more to be added as the game grows towards it;s final form)
Con's: Not enough quests to do at one time (though as with the last, I expect more to come with the game's growth)
Pro's: All the items are free, you earn all your cash, Diamonds and your higher currency for the items you want...no payments at all.  Basically (you have bought the game and so the game is yours with no further payments needed) <A very high mark in my book.
Pro's: The game size is freakin out of this world, under a GB and with the graphics it has it looks 100 times better than the afore mentioned games.
Pro's: plays on any computer/laptop (I am using a laptop with onboard graphics and it even runs sluggish most of the time and i can play the game fine)
Pro's: you can visit your friends and interact with them and help them out in their own farms. even the other games,all you could do was help out 5 times and then that was it you had no other option to go back to your own farm as there was nothing that their games were allowing you to do for your friends farm.
Pro's: You even get a cute li'll tractor that is free to run, the gas is free and only the actions cost you fuel...you could take it for a spin all day and not use the fuel until you try plant something or harvest something.
Pro's: The game is all about interaction, you don't get that with the other games like this on Facebook or elsewhere.
Pro's: you can have more than one farm at a time.


This will do for now , I don't want to overload you at the moment with too many Pro's for the game and as you can see there are really no con's about the game atm.  

As the game stands I would reccommend the game for pretty much any age and style of player.  Expect bugs and glitches, it is an Early Access game and therefore has a lot of growing to do and for one; I am very interested to find out what this awesome farming game will grow into and what it will look like on the final form.

5/5 for this Early Access game

40516070.review:
Sabe aquele joguinho [Hay Day] de fazenda que você joga em seu tablet ou smartphone, sim... aquele que é totalmente viciante, que dá vontade de você entrar toda hora no joguinho para você ver como está a sua fazendinha? Agora imagine ele em 3D em uma tela maior, podendo fazer N coisas a mais enquanto você espera sua colheita ficar pronta.

Essa é a proposta deste maravilhoso simulador de fazenda chamado Farm Together. Nele você pode fazer N coisas enquanto espera sua horta ficar pronta para colher. O jogo tem uma enorme capacidade de te prender nele, fazendo você esquecer completamente do mundo lá fora [sério, você nem vê as horas passar]. 

Nele você pode plantar, regar, colher, cuidar dos seus animais [desde galinhas, porcos, patos até vacas], enfeitar sua fazenda, expandi-la e fabricar alguns itens como queijos, geléias, mel... você também pode caracterizar seu fazendeiro [seu personagem] com vários itens, tipos de cabelos, roupas que o jogo vai destravando conforme você vai elevando seu nível de jogador. Pode também customizar seu trator com a cor que quiser e desenhos disponíveis no jogo.

O melhor de tudo neste joguinho é que ele faz juz ao nome "together", sem o menor problema [mesmo] você pode jogar com seus amigos, ajuda-los com suas fazendas e eles com a sua. A jogabilidade é bem simples e fácil, além de ter chat de texto e voz para se comunicar dentro do jogo com seus amigos. Eu adorei, esse jogo é maravilhoso! Recomendo demais! ;D

Obs: O jogo recebe atualizações frequentementes. Você quase sempre tem algo novo adicionado a cada atualização [ a última agora foi acrescentado outros idiomas, dentro dele o Português Brasileiro, e flores como as lindas papoulas ].

https://youtu.be/3UVcFNNNCxc

--------------- English Version

Do you know that Hay Day game that you play on your tablet or smartphone, yes ... the one that is totally addictive, that makes you want to go all the time in the game to see how your farm is doing? Now imagine it in 3D on a larger screen, you can make N more things while you wait for your crop to be ready.

This is the proposal of this wonderful farm simulator called Farm Together. In it you can do N things while waiting for your vegetable garden to be ready to reap. The game has an enormous ability to trap you in it, making you completely forget about the outside world [seriously, you can not even see the hours go by].

In it you can plant, water, harvest, care for your animals [from chickens, pigs, ducks to cows], decorate your farm, expand it and make some items like cheese, jellies, honey ... you can also characterize your farmer [your character] with various items, types of hair, clothes that the game unlocks as you raise your player level. You can also customize your tractor with the color you want and designs available in the game.

The best thing of all in this game is that it does with the name "together", without the slightest problem [even] you can play with your friends, help them with their farms and they with yours. The gameplay is very simple and easy, in addition to having text and voice chat to communicate within the game with your friends. I loved it, this game is wonderful! Highly recommend! D

Note: The game receives updates frequently. You almost always have something new added to each update [the last one has now been added other languages, within it Brazilian Portuguese, and flowers like the beautiful poppies].

40513822.review:
Is Farm Together Any Good?

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P42Uv0oiraA]My Gameplay impressions video[/url]


THE GOODS

THE CROPS (There are so many to plant, harvest, and level up... ya, leveling up crops increases the money you receive when they are harvested!)

VARIOUS TREES (with apples, pears, bananas, you name it!)

PROPS (decorate your farm with fences, archways, paths, garden gnomes, bar-b-q's, windmills, barns... so many things!)

FISH (to go fishing, duh)

FARM ANIMALS (like buck buck chickens and little piggies)

CHARACTER AND TRACTOR CUSTOMIZATION (earn experience doing EVERYTHING and unlock various hairdos, outfits, tractor paint jobs and models when you level up!)

MULTIPLAAAAAAYER! (play with friends, strangers, strange friends, they're all there to help you harvest, plant, plot, build, plow, feed, sell. FRIENDS FOREVER!)

THIS MUSIC (it's so chill you gonna need a sweater. Seriously, it's incredibly zen-like)

AMAZING DEVS WITH WEEKLY CONTENT AND QUALITY OF LIFE UPDATES DURING EARLY ACCESS (these guys are pumping out patches and communicating with players on a constant basis. Milkstone is rockin this!)

POLISHED GAMEPLAY AND VISUALS (look at them, they so clean! Everything seems to work as it should and the gameplay is incredibly accessible, even for the kids!)

LITTLE-TO-NO BUGS (so far, haven't really seen any, the ones I have devs patched practically imediately. HIGH FIVES TO THE DEV TEAM!) *HIGH FIVE SOUND*  

FARM EXPANSION (the initial lot seems huge... but then you find out you can expand in all 4 directions multiple times making this the biggest farming game in HISTORRRRRRRY YOU GUN BE BUSY!!!! [TEXT: *may not be the biggest game in history])

REAL TIME CROPS (each crop has various real-time growth which can be sped up by watering them. Oh, and they continue to grow even when you're not playing!)

RANDOM QUESTS (used to earn a special currency for purchasing specific items and buildings in game, also helps to give you a goal.)

aaaaand all with NOOOOO MICROTRANSACTIONS!


SOME BADS?

BUILDING PATHWAYS ONE AT A TIME (oh how I wish we could go to a different top-down view to plop down pathways instead of doing them one at a time with our character)

I WANT AUTOMATION (I'd love to see automated farm tools you could unlock or buy to help with larger farming setups)


SO, IS FARM TOGETHER ANY GOOD?!

Ya, it's good!

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P42Uv0oiraA]My Gameplay impressions video[/url]

40505339.review:
NO MICRO-TRANSACTIONS

To anyone watching youtube videos and seeing the diamond currency, don't be mistaken this is not a micro-transaction currency. You can make diamonds so easily in this game they are just a secondary currency and the developer has confirmed they are not going to ad microtransactions such a "Buy 1,000 diamonds for $10" type stuff. 

That now cleared up and hopefully encourages those who are sceptical to give it a try, on to my quick review. 

I don't do reviews often but this little gem is exactly what I look for in games. Relaxing turn your brain off and just chillout gameplay. If I had to give a short review i'd say it's like a 3D hayday but without all the MT rubbish. Not ony that but it has tons of crops and things to do. 

The first few hours you might think OMG timers i don't want to wait but as your farm grows you are so busy with so many different things they are hardly an issue and let's face it, crop take time to grow, if they was instant where would be the gameplay. 

I don't want to spoil the progression for those who have not expereinced it but let's just say that you need to keep farming and building up your money for later content :)

40498860.review:
หลังจากผมเล่น Haver Moon ในเกม GBA ผมก็ใฝ่ฝัน อยากจะทำฟาร์มกับเพื่อนๆ ด้วยกันหลายๆ คน สักครั้งหนึ่งในชีวิต
จนกระทั้งเกม stardew valley ออกมาให้เล่น ผมก็หวังว่ามันจะมีระบบ multiplayer มาให้เล่น แล้วผมก็ยังคงต้องฝันต่อไป
ในที่สุดความฝันของผมก็เป็นจริง หลังผ่านมาเกือบ 18 ปี กับเกม Farm Together

Farm Together สามารถให้คุณชวนเพื่อนๆ ของคุณมาทำฟาร์มได้มากถึง 16 คน
แถมยังสามารถให้ผู้เล่นคนอื่นๆ เข้ามาเยี่ยมชมฟาร์มของคุณได้อีกด้วย 
การสร้างห้องออนไลน์ทำได้ง่ายมากๆ คุณสามารถตั้งค่าให้เพื่อนของคุณทำอะไรได้บ้างในฟาร์มของคุณ และคนอื่นๆ ที่เข้ามาเยี่ยมชม
ตัวเกมมีขนาดแค่ 300 MB เท่านั้น แต่ภาพที่ได้งดงามมากๆ 

*จุดเด่นของเกม
- มีภาษาไทย
- มีตัวละคร ชาย/หญิง สามารถปรับแต่งตัวละครได้
- ระบบสภาพอากาศ ที่เปลี่ยนแปลงตามฤดูกาล
- ระบบการบังคับที่ทำได้เข้าใจง่ายมาก 
- มีรถแทรกเตอร์ให้ใช้ในเกม ทำให้ชีวิตง่ายขึ้น
- สามารถเลี้ยงวัว หมู ไก่ ปลา ได้
- สามารถสร้างสิ่งปลูกสร้างได้ เช่น โรงนา ร้านค้า กังหันลม ฯลฯ
- ผู้เล่นคนอื่นสามาถมาเที่ยวฟาร์มเราได้ 
- เล่นกับเพื่อนได้ 16 คน
- มีระบบเควสให้ทำ
- เพลงฟังสบายมาก
- ระบบ Online Multiplayer ที่ลื่นไหลมากๆ สร้างห้องง่าย ตั้งค่าได้ง่าย
- สามารถออกไปเยี่ยมชมฟาร์มของผู้เล่นคนอื่นๆ ได้
- มีโหมดถ่ายภาพ เปลี่ยนเกมเป็นเกมถ่ายรูปได้เลย 
- มี Steam Cloud เซฟเกมบนคลาวด์ ย้ายเครื่องเซฟเราก็ยังอยู่ โคตรดี

 *จุดด้อย (ในอนาคตมีอัพเดทเข้ามาแน่นอน)
- ยังไม่มี NPC ให้เราพูดคุย 
- ยังไม่มีเมืองให้เดินเที่ยว
- ยังไม่มีระบบเทศกาล 
- ยังไม่สามารถสร้างบ้าน ตกแต่งบ้านได้

40490594.review:
Farm together!

That name says all about this game.

Get your farm and have fun with your friends :)

Pros:
- Change your character
- Change your tractor
- Weekly updates (so I believe there will be a lot of additional features in the future)
- A lot of different crops, trees, fishes, animals
- Lots of items to create your personal farm
- XP system & quests
- 4 seasons (Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter)
- 2nd level items out of buildings (e.g. Milk gets cheese, fruits get jam)

Cons:
- no tractor or character upgrades - some kind of talent tree would be nice
- you run out of fuel with the tractor pretty quick on bigger farms
- fishing system is a bit frustrating
- animals
    - - run out of food quickly
    - - no benefits for collection with your tractor
    - - you can't generate food for them (you have to pay for the food)
    - - higher level animals only have different color compared to the low level ones
- you can't "share" your farm with your mates that they can work together when you are not online
- when you reach level 25+ there will be nothing new

Suggestions:
- get dung from animals to fertilize for more $$$ or quicker growing
- big barn for animals
- 3rd level products (e.g. yogurt out of milk + fruits = fruit yogurt)
- talent tree and research tree
- build your own house with furniture

40479046.review:
这是个纯粹休闲的农牧场模拟经营游戏，目前并没有剧情模式，类似于《扣扣农场》、《开心农场》、手机上的《卡通农场》等游戏，只不过是3D画风。所以，如果你对其他RPG元素或者剧情有要求的话，目前不建议入此游戏。这游戏就适合上班累了偶尔进去做一会农活，体验一把“采菊东篱下，悠然见南山”的田园风，如果您耐心不好，或者想卖肝的话，建议就换个游戏吧。

游戏操作非常简单，对新手来说无需很繁琐的教程，看懂按键说明即可。我个人觉得即使无中文也可以随便玩，都是些简单的英文。即便你真的什么都看不懂，对照商店和任务那些物品图片和名称，也能猜个八九分，当然将来有中文那是更好。

其实，主要互动键是键盘Space键，感觉比鼠标左键好用。随着升级出加油站，有了神器拖拉机后，感觉有种可以螺旋上天的感觉。感谢制作组解放我的双手，后面单人模式会不会考虑再加一个异性NPC替我上货架呢？有木有宠物系统呢，有个小跟班陪着感觉也蛮不错的。多人联机模式，给不喜欢孤独的人提供了一个选择，共同努力分享劳动的果实，如果再来个结婚生娃的系统会不会更逆天呢？

下雨还要浇水的设定无法理解，难道土地是海绵做的？既然做农活，光浇水不施肥么，让作物发发光，带个加速Buff什么的。期待正式版的时候能加入更多的休闲玩法，更多的装饰品，更多的动物，更多的农作物，以及更多的互动元素，让游戏内容更加充实。

40475101.review:
Cute basic farming game, with a bit of an odd farming system.
There is no real "time" or "days" in the game. The crops grow by a timer, that counts down the more you water them.
The seasons change every 17 minutes, so you will often need to replant new crops.
The game drops you into a plot of land, with basic text tutorials to start you off.
Animals work almost the same as crops.

Pros:
Cute art style, with basic character and tractor customization
Easy to customize farm, and move objects around
Multplayer, players can help out on eachothers farms
Very relaxing game

Cons:
You will still need to water your crops in the rain
Not much content yet, though there is promised regular updates
No places to explore, no towns, no NPCs

Don't expect this game to be the next Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, Staxel, or My Time At Portia. Farm Together is strictly basic farming, with not much reward.

40463634.review:
Yet another in the list of farming simulators, Farm Together comes with slightly cartoony graphics and the main gameplay objective being to go bother your friends on their farms and help them haul in the produce.

What little I have been able to play with friends has been enjoyable, but an expanding farm can also be ran (to the ground) by a single player if there's no interest in pulling in one's friends.

When first starting a farm, it will be set public and be visible in the list of online farms. Anyone who plays the game may join in to rummage about on your farm, but Farm Together has a lovely permissions system to prevent these interlopers from doing harm.
Failing that, there's the kick or ban option to consider.

Starting from humble beginnings with a few crops and some trees randomly strewn about the place, you'll soon find there's ample things to do;
- Plant, maintain, and harvest almost two dozen different crops, each with their own growth time and seasonal requirements.
- Plant and harvest trees in the seasons in which they bear fruit.
- Engage in animal husbandry with anything from chickens to pigs and even ducks.
- Create your own ponds with tropical fish and stand around on the side watching them swim about.
- Customize your farm with a number of scenery objects and roads.

There are a few limits to the game, but they don't detract too much from the overall enjoyment;
- Fish can't go in the natural lakes and rivers which are already on the map.
- You can't change the map's natural objects like hills, water, bridges, or rocks and will have to work around them instead.
- While there are a small number of gestures to perform, you can't actually use any of the furniture you put down, and there's no option to sit.

While still in development, the game runs smoothly and has plenty to keep one occupied.

40458833.review:
THIS REVIEW IS MY OWN UNBIASED OPINION - I was not compensated or rewarded for this review in any way.

I bought this game on a whim - and I ended up enjoying it a lot.

[u][b]BUYER NOTICE:[/b][/u]  Do NOT expect this game to be Stardew Valley/Harvest Moon/My Time at Portia.  It is not.  This game focuses on solely the farming aspect, there are no other characters (other than in multiplayer), there's no combat, there's no relationships (unless you get REALLY attached to your animals).  What this game IS: a relaxing, casual farming experience to play by yourself or with friends whenever you have time.

This game lets you farm plants and animals in real-time, with each season lasting 17 minutes.  The real-time aspect is similar to mobile farming games, however there are absolutely no microtransactions, and you can cut down significantly on growth times by watering the plants when they need it.  Anyways, each time you harvest a plant/animal, you earn coins (buy more plants/animals with this), and a produce item (eggs, vegetables, etc.) which can either be traded at a market stand for gems (used to buy structures) or used at another structure to make it into something else (I think?  I'm not that far yet).  Rinse and repeat, unlocking new plants, animals, structures, and decorations as you level up your farm.

Time progresses even when you're not playing, so your plants can mature and your animals will produce if they have enough food, but the nice thing is plants don't wilt or anything, so you can take as much time as you need between logins.  In other words, you can log off and not worry about your plants or animals dying or something silly.

Early game is quite repetitive until you get your tractor, so earn as much XP as you can.  Farming becomes much more enjoyable and fast once you have the tractor.  There are also a fair amount of character customization; you can change your tractor, your clothes, your hair, your gender, etc.

All in all, the game is REALLY relaxing.  The music is soft and fitting, the gameplay is easy and straight-forward, and the game runs smooth even with maxxed graphics, I'm fairly sure older machines could run this game just fine.  The game has a nice ambience to it as well, each season has its own color palettes and effects like snow.

[b]SUGGESTIONS TO THE DEVS:[/b]

[list]
[*]Ambient critters that run around your farm would be cute (besides butterflies), maybe squirrels or birds and such.
[*]Moar upgrades and structures!
[*]In line with more upgrades, maybe a tool to make animal harvesting easier (I couldnt find a way to use the tractor)?
[*]A way to quickly move large parts of your farm would be good; something like it puts you in a birds eye view mode and you click to pick up and click to move instantly, so when you're shifting your tree farm around it doesnt take 3 years of running back and forth.
[*]PLEASE PLEASE get rid of whatever it is that makes the edges of the screen / grass blurry.  I've tried turning Ambient Occlusion and Depth of Field on/off/every which way and it never goes away.  It's literally terrible and hurts my eyes.  I dont care if it hits gfx performance to turn it off, at least give us the option.  If I look anywhere other than the middle of my screen it burns my eyes :(
[*]Early game could be a bit less grindy, it might turn people away from the game before they even get their tractor.  Maybe just a bit less XP for early levels?
[/list]

(Sorry if there's any weird formatting, I'm trying some new things.)

OVERALL RATING: 8/10

I highly recommend this game to anyone looking for a casual farming experience by themselves or with a friend/significant other.

40447511.review:
[b]Time spent In-game when I posted this review:[/b]
3.1 hrs on record

[b]PROS[/b]

+ Art Style
+ Calming / Relaxing / Chill game. (More calming than Stardew Valley)
+ Great OST / Soundtrack / Background Music.
+ Time flies by.... still want to keep playing. (ie Addicting)
+ No micro transactions.
+ Well optimised. (Will most probably work on a mid-low-end Laptop/PC)
+ Windowed mode. (All the way down to 640x480)
+ Customizable character (Clothes for Male/Female)
+ Co-op (Note: Can also be played Single Player/Alone both offline and online if you want.)

[b]CONS[/b]

- Too little content for the price paid at the moment. (Early access ; Hopefully many more things will be added.)
- Feels way too much like a mobile game. ('Farmville'? - a F2P browser/facebook game) - Level up system, Multiple currencies. There is even "Daily login rewards"! (I mean why are the devs wasting their time adding these in such a great game that doesn't need these but something else?). As soon as I saw the daily login rewards I had to check if I was playing a farming game on an Android emulator I had installed cause I was sure I was on my laptop and that I bought this game on Steam. Felt weird.
- [b]All[/b] buildings cannot be entered (Barns for animals? No. grow them outside. The barn is just for show. Again - feels like mobile games.)
- No home/house. When it rains and you are outside soaking wet and your hair and clothes all drenched and you have no where to go but work or stand still. Feels bad man.
- The name of the game is cheesy [b]but the game is great![/b] Wanted to post this here cause I myself would have avoided this game looking at the name but glad I didn't. But it still feels weird that when I go to my profile I see myself playing a game called 'Farm Together' more adding to the point.... feels like I'm playing a mobile game.

TL;DR
Q) Would I recommend you to buy this game?
A) Just get it. The many relaxing and peaceful hours of your future spent here is well worth it.



My Rating:
8.5/10

40410306.review:
10 hours in, my first "still in early access" review.

* Quick update after 60+ hours: Game is receiving regular content updates and dev listens to player feedback. I can only recommend it more and more as a perfect little casual farm game. I will add 60+ hour comments below noted with an *

The first and most important thing you should know is, this game feels like playing a mobile game. If you don't like that, you will never like this game! <<< Really there is no way you will if those game mechanics bug you.

Now if you're still interested, this is what I found until now.

- You play on your own farm and you can visit other players farms freely. (you can own more then 1 farm/savegame)
- Default new farm settings let other people visit your farm when you're playing on it. This can easily be changed if you don't like it.
- Not playing on your own farm, then it's offline to everyone else!
- All farms are in their own world (which is HUGE), visiting others means you close your farm and load/visit theirs.
- Grieving (people trying to harm your farm): I have seen none as the default settings protect your farm, you can remove all limits if you are... uhm insane?

- You level your farm by playing on it, levels unlock more crops, animals, trees and buildings.
- You earn money by harvesting crops, trees and animals and you can earn diamonds by selling those crops.
- Diamonds are used to build buildings like your selling point shops, fuel station for your tractor and a lot of cosmetic items/buildings.
- You earn 5 diamonds per 20 crops, 10 fruits, 20 fish, 20 eggs at this moment in time.
- Doing quests give you medals which are used for special buildings like fuel stations, medals can be earned easier at a higher farm level through making special items from your farm harvests like jam, cheese and more.
- There is NO ingame shop, and NO microtransaction to buy anything.

- You also level your farmer, which unlocks cosmetics which can be freely changed anytime, again NO real money shop.
- Every day on your farm is a season, all seasons are included and crops can only be planted in the correct season (a day/season lasts 17 minutes).
- You can visit other players (A.F.A.I.K. you only see geo locations close to you, for me this is Dutch and German players)
- NO way to favorite farms or add/visit friends at this moment in time. (*THIS FEATURE HAS BEEN ADDED!)
- Everything has a visible timer which you can see and influence by watering crops and feeding animals.
- Everyone that visited me or that I visited was extremely friendly. Most just look around, some even help. (farm tourism!) (*AFTER 60+ hours a total of 1 dumb person said something stupid, it took me about 5 seconds to kick and ban him/her through easy ingame options)

The game already feels very polished, they have said that they'll add even more crops, trees and animals during early access. (*They've added plenty of new crops, animals and buildings in several patches since release)

For now after 10 hours of gameplay, this game gets a big juicy thumbs up from me as it's really fun to play.

* As said above, after 60+ hours I can only recommend this casual farm game more and more!
